#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

bool isvowel(char k){
	if(k=='a'||k=='i'||k=='e'||k=='o'||k=='u')
		return true;
	return false;
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	char str1[101], str2[101];
	cin.getline(str1,101);
	int j = 0;
	for(int i = 0; i < strlen(str1); i++){
		str2[j] = str1[i];
		if(isvowel(str1[i])){
			i = i + 2;
		}
		j++;
	}
	str2[j] = '\0';
	cout << str2;
	return 0;
}
